div.p: The official URL for this implementation guide is:

name.value: NO Domain VitalSigns Observation - Blood pressure

description.value: Base profile for Norwegian Vital Signs Observation Blood pressure information. The local measurement of arterial blood pressure, which is a surrogate for arterial pressure in the systemic circulation.

name.value: NO Domain VitalSigns Observation - Body Height

description.value: Base profile for Norwegian Vital Signs Observation Body Height information. To be used for recording the measured height or body length of an individual at any point in time.

name.value: NO Domain VitalSigns Observation - Body Mass Index (BMI)

description.value: Base profile for Norwegian Vital Signs Observation Body Mass Index information. Calculated measurement which compares a person's weight and height.

name.value: NO Domain VitalSigns Observation - Body Temperature

description.value: Base profile for Norwegian Vital Signs Observation Body Temperature information. Used for recording the measurement of an individual's body temperature, which is a surrogate for the core body temperature of the individual.

name.value: NO Domain VitalSigns Observation - Body Weight

description.value: Base profile for Norwegian Vital Signs Observation Body Weight information. To be used for recording the actual measurement of body weight, including when the individual is missing a body part due to a congenital cause or after surgical removal.

name.value: NO Domain VitalSigns Observation - Heart Rate

description.value: Base profile for Norwegian Vital Signs Observation Heart Rate information. Use to record the presence or absence of a pulse or heart beat.

name.value: NO Domain VitalSigns Observation - Oxygen Saturation

description.value: Base profile for Norwegian Vital Signs Observation Oxygen Saturation information. Use to record blood oxygen and related measurements, measured by pulse oximetry or pulse CO-oximetry.
Base profile for Norwegian Vital Signs Observation Pulse information. The rate and associated attributes for a pulse.

name.value: NO Domain VitalSigns Observation - Respiration Rate

description.value: Base profile for Norwegian Vital Signs Observation Respiration Rate information. Use to record the observed and measured characteristics of spontaneous breathing by an individual, including respiratory rate, depth and rhythm.
